---
title: "Features"
---

```{r}
#| echo: FALSE
#| output: FALSE

library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(DT)

metadata_features <- read_csv("features.csv")

```

```{r}
#| echo: FALSE
#| out-width: '1000px'

metadata_features |>
  select(-`data source local`) |>
  mutate(`data source` = if_else(is.na(`data source`), "", stringr::str_glue("<a href='{`data source`}'>{`data source`}</a>"))) |> 
  datatable(
    width = "3000px",
    filter = "top",
    options = list(
      scrollY = "800px",
      lengthMenu = list(c(25, 100, -1), c("25", "100", "All")),
      pageLength = nrow(metadata_features)
    ),
    escape = FALSE
  )
```
